name: SimpleScreenRecorder
description: SimpleScreenRecorder is a screen recording software. It's characterized with entire desktop recording, application window, window size specifying, audio/ video sync, video scaling and other functions.

en_US.description: SimpleScreenRecorder is a screen recording software. It's characterized with entire desktop recording, application window, window size specifying, audio/ video sync, video scaling and other functions.
en_US.name: SimpleScreenRecorder

zh_CN.description: SimpleScreenRecorder是一款屏幕录制软件，它具有录制整个桌面、应用窗口、指定窗口大小以及音/视频同步，视频缩放等功能。
zh_CN.name: SimpleScreenRecorder
